title: Ba wang bie ji
overview: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and will endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.

title: La leggenda del pianista sull'oceano
overview: A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

title: Once
overview: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

title: A Star Is Born
overview: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: The Red Shoes
overview: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

title: Jules et Jim
overview: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

title: Billy Elliot
overview: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

title: Un long dimanche de fiançailles
overview: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
overview: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

title: Hiroshima mon amour
overview: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

title: Brief Encounter
overview: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

title: Good Will Hunting
overview: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: Portrait de la jeune fille en feu
overview: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

title: Pink Floyd: The Wall
overview: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

title: Some Like It Hot
overview: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: Gegen die Wand
overview: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

title: Titanic
overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Whiplash
overview: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: Smultronstället
overview: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.
